definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: You only run these segments when you call the function.
sentences.chinese: 在您調用函數時，僅運行相應的片斷。

sentences.english: The field cache has therefore been modified such that it only reloads parts where the segment has changed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，修改後的字段緩存只會加載更新過的片斷。

sentences.english: He was calm and steady when playing difficult things.
sentences.chinese: 在演奏一些難度片斷時，他依然很淡定。

sentences.english: This little snake had a tougher customer the other day in the bit of eternity it was trying to swallow.
sentences.chinese: 那天，這難纏傢伙成爲小蛇難以下嚥的不朽片斷。
切土豆成叮咬大小的片斷。

sentences.english: Does not have detachable pieces that can lodge in the windpipe, ears, or nostrils.
sentences.chinese: 沒有可拆卸的片斷，可以向在氣管，耳朵，或鼻孔。

sentences.english: The avirulence gene fragment is homologous in all races of the pathogen of Xoo.
sentences.chinese: 該無毒基因片斷在此病原的不同小種中均有同源性。

sentences.english: She took a piece of bacon and ran out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她採取了煙肉片斷並且用盡了房子。

sentences.english: A lol of Passage of Wei Book, which were rich and colorful, were full of features of short story.
sentences.chinese: 緯書內容豐富博雜，許多緯書片斷具有濃郁的小說性。

sentences.english: The image below illustrates a piece of an SDD file that carries out a test case.
sentences.chinese: 下圖顯示了執行測試用例的SDD文件的片斷。

sentences.english: Both code snippets will retrieve the tasks where the assignee currently is the given user.
sentences.chinese: 上述兩個代碼片斷都能夠取出用戶被支使的使命列表。

sentences.english: He skillfully fuses these fragments into a cohesive whole.
sentences.chinese: 他巧妙地把這些片斷合併成連貫的整體。

sentences.english: Inspired by a piece of pottery made by Eva.
sentences.chinese: 啓發由伊娃做的瓦器片斷。

sentences.english: The repeated process fragment must be placed inside these loop modeling elements.
sentences.chinese: 重複的流程片斷必須置於這些循環建模元素內。

sentences.english: Rip off as many samples from horror movies as possible to use in your extreme album. Copyright is for pussies .
sentences.chinese: 從恐怖電影中抄襲儘量多的片斷用在你的極端專輯中。

sentences.english: Over the past few years they have been working on the various bits and pieces needed.
sentences.chinese: 過去的幾年中，他們在各式各樣的字節和片斷中工作。

definition: to digress/to stray from the subject
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
to force someone to do something
interlude/to cross the stage/to do sth as a mere formality/to go through the motions
to talk about this and that (idiom); to ramble incoherently
